name: Chicken in Creamy Pan Sauce
author: Kraft
summary: Chicken breasts simmered in a creamy sauce make an easy but elegant dinner.
ingredients: 4 small boneless skinless chicken breast halves
¾ cup fat-free, reduced-sodium chicken broth
directions: Heat oil in large skillet on medium heat
Add chicken; cook 5 to 6 minutes on each side or until cooked through (165 degrees F)
Remove chicken from skillet, reserving drippings in skillet
Add broth to skillet; stir to scrape up browned bits from bottom of skillet
Add cream cheese; cook 2 to 3 minutes or until cream cheese is melted and sauce starts to thicken, stirring constantly with wire whisk
Return chicken to skillet; turn over to coat both sides of chicken with sauce
Cook 2 minutes or until chicken is heated through
